item.description:
Join us for a community bike ride at 5 pm followed by a 6 pm yoga class. The bike ride will tour through two of Hartford's scenic parks: Goodwin Park Golf Course and the historic Cedar Hill Cemetery. You can bring your bike, or rent one for the evening from the green bikes shop located next door to the Growing Green Co-op.

$5 suggested donation for yoga class; community bike ride is free!

All donations are greatly appreciated and will support the operations of the Growing Green Co-op's community center and healing arts space.
item.name: Yoga & Community Bike Ride
